name: Yellow Rose
description:
In this short Visual Novel, you, a mercenary, are contracted by Queen Rose of the Yellow Rose Kingdom to hunt down various monsters. According to the Queen, these are antagonistic creatures that have stolen many treasure, killed villagers, and other nasty things.  You could slay these beasts, soaking your sword and fists in blood, but perhaps there's another route. Perhaps it's not the monster that are truly evil.

[This is a submission for the Maximum Monster Month game jam, currently WIP. Character art and other BGs will be made eventually]
